articles.title: Study explores vaping trends among US adults with cardiovascular disease - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: A new paper discusses the trends in the use of e-cigarettes among American adults with pre-existing cardiovascular disease (CVD).
articles.content: A new paper published in JAMA Network Open discusses the trends in the use of e-cigarettes among American adults with pre-existing cardiovascular disease (CVD). Smoking tobacco is a widespread practi… [+4349 chars]
